solution_line_template: After knocking the bucket over, Alex was left with {alex_initial_fish} - {alex_lost_fish} = <<{alex_initial_fish}-{alex_lost_fish}={alex_remaining_fish}>>{alex_remaining_fish} fish left.
The final amount caught by Jacob to beat Alex by {beat_by_one} fish is {alex_remaining_fish} +{beat_by_one} = <<{alex_remaining_fish}+{beat_by_one}={jacob_target_fish}>>{jacob_target_fish} fish.
Then Jacob needs to catch {jacob_target_fish} - {jacob_initial_fish} = <<{jacob_target_fish}-{jacob_initial_fish}={fish_to_catch}>>{fish_to_catch} fish more.
